language.entry: Onnabushi

Clad in curious fashion, this Oriental is perhaps amongst the strangest sights to wander into this forsaken hamlet. Armed with exotic weapons meticulously forged for fatal purposes, the Onnabushi wields them with graceful alacrity; turning combat into a grisly artform.

The Onnabushi fields into battle armed with spear, sword and bow. However, all these tools of death are only second of importance to a proficient and experienced body; one versed in the art of killing and steeled by countless bloodshed.

Do not be fooled by this warrior's blank, blood-soaked mask. Once the clash of blades and the drums of war come to a halt, the Onnabushi remains a woman at heart. As gentle as a summer breeze, she will tend and nurture her comrades if need be.

Onnabushi

Clad in curious fashion, this Oriental is perhaps amongst the strangest sights to wander into this forsaken hamlet. Armed with exotic weapons meticulously forged for fatal purposes, the Onnabushi wields them with graceful alacrity; turning combat into a grisly artform.

The Onnabushi fields into battle armed with spear, sword and bow. However, all these tools of death are only second of importance to a proficient and experienced body; one versed in the art of killing and steeled by countless bloodshed.

Do not be fooled by this warrior's blank, blood-soaked mask. Once the clash of blades and the drums of war come to a halt, the Onnabushi remains a woman at heart. As gentle as a summer breeze, she will tend and nurture her comrades if need be.

Onnabushi

Clad in curious fashion, this Oriental is perhaps amongst the strangest sights to wander into this forsaken hamlet. Armed with exotic weapons meticulously forged for fatal purposes, the Onnabushi wields them with graceful alacrity; turning combat into a grisly artform.

The Onnabushi fields into battle armed with spear, sword and bow. However, all these tools of death are only second of importance to a proficient and experienced body; one versed in the art of killing and steeled by countless bloodshed.

Do not be fooled by this warrior's blank, blood-soaked mask. Once the clash of blades and the drums of war come to a halt, the Onnabushi remains a woman at heart. As gentle as a summer breeze, she will tend and nurture her comrades if need be.

Onnabushi

Clad in curious fashion, this Oriental is perhaps amongst the strangest sights to wander into this forsaken hamlet. Armed with exotic weapons meticulously forged for fatal purposes, the Onnabushi wields them with graceful alacrity; turning combat into a grisly artform.

The Onnabushi fields into battle armed with spear, sword and bow. However, all these tools of death are only second of importance to a proficient and experienced body; one versed in the art of killing and steeled by countless bloodshed.

Do not be fooled by this warrior's blank, blood-soaked mask. Once the clash of blades and the drums of war come to a halt, the Onnabushi remains a woman at heart. As gentle as a summer breeze, she will tend and nurture her comrades if need be.

Onnabushi

Clad in curious fashion, this Oriental is perhaps amongst the strangest sights to wander into this forsaken hamlet. Armed with exotic weapons meticulously forged for fatal purposes, the Onnabushi wields them with graceful alacrity; turning combat into a grisly artform.

The Onnabushi fields into battle armed with spear, sword and bow. However, all these tools of death are only second of importance to a proficient and experienced body; one versed in the art of killing and steeled by countless bloodshed.

Do not be fooled by this warrior's blank, blood-soaked mask. Once the clash of blades and the drums of war come to a halt, the Onnabushi remains a woman at heart. As gentle as a summer breeze, she will tend and nurture her comrades if need be.
